hero.description1: I'm a Frontend Developer passionate about building user-focused React/React Native applications. Thrown into a fast-paced environment early on, I quickly adapted alongside mentors and joined startup projects that taught me to embrace challenges and deliver solutions despite evolving requirements.
hero.description2: Growing up between Minnesota and Latvia before attending Ontario Hockey Academy gave me diverse perspectives and fluency in English, German, and Russian—skills that enhance my collaborative approach to problem-solving.
hero.description3: I'm driven by technology's constant evolution, progressing from HTML/CSS through JavaScript to React, SharePoint, SPFx, Django, and React Native. I believe in code's limitless potential—if you can imagine it, it can be built, refined, and perfected.
hero.description4: Off-screen, I'm on the ice, boxing, traveling, or unwinding with friends. This balance refreshes my creativity and brings new perspectives to my development work.

projects.sectionDescription: Outside of the full-time job, these are some of the projects that I've built as a hobby, school, or freelance works.

project1.title: SPFX Employee Profile Portal
project1.shortDescription: SharePoint web part enabling personalized employee profiles
project1.detailedDescription:
Developed and architected a responsive, dynamic SPFx component for employee profile pages.

Leveraging the Microsoft Graph API, the component retrieves and updates user information, allowing employees to personalize and manage their profiles.

It integrates seamlessly with the seating chart and user directory, enhancing the user experience by making it easy to locate coworkers and view their details in a visually friendly interface.

Integrated multilingual support using i18n, automatically adapting the interface to the user's selected language—English, Russian, or Uzbek—with English set as the default fallback.

project2.title: SPFX Employee Directory
project2.shortDescription: Multilingual company directory with advanced filtering and profile integration
project2.detailedDescription:
Designed and implemented a user-friendly employee directory for the company.

Using Microsoft Graph API, I enabled efficient querying and filtering of users by department or custom search.

The directory features dynamic navigation—clicking on a user seamlessly routes to their individual profile page, creating a smooth and intuitive user experience.

Integrated multilingual support using i18n, automatically adapting the interface to the user's selected language—English, Russian, or Uzbek—with English set as the default fallback.

project3.title: SPFX Interactive Seating Chart
project3.shortDescription: Dynamic company seating map with smart navigation and multilingual support
project3.detailedDescription:
Built a dynamic, two-floor seating chart for the company, featuring department-based filtering and user highlighting for easy employee location.

Integrated with the employee profile page—when users clicked "Where I sit," the app would automatically navigate to the Seating Chart component, scroll to their exact desk, and visually highlight their seat for quick identification.

Integrated multilingual support using i18n, automatically adapting the interface to the user's selected language—English, Russian, or Uzbek—with English set as the default fallback.

project4.title: SPFX Upcoming Birthdays & Holidays
project4.shortDescription: Seasonal calendar showing upcoming employee birthdays and company holidays
project4.detailedDescription:
Developed a SharePoint SPFx component that dynamically displays upcoming employee birthdays and holidays a week in advance.

The interface was seasonally color-coded for visual appeal and included clear distinctions between holidays and birthdays.

This user-friendly component helped promote team spirit and awareness by keeping employees informed of upcoming birthday celebrations and time off.

Integrated multilingual support using i18n, automatically adapting the interface to the user's selected language—English, Russian, or Uzbek—with English set as the default fallback.

project5.title: Professional Consulting Platform
project5.shortDescription: Django-based consulting website with integrated scheduling and content management
project5.detailedDescription:
Sole Front-End developer for a full-scale consulting website using Django, featuring a modular architecture and several custom-built components.

Integrated a dynamic article editor, scheduling calendars, and user-friendly dashboards.

Leveraged Bootstrap 5 to ensure responsive layouts and cohesive UI across devices.

Established a universal design system and reusable utility classes to streamline development and maintain visual consistency throughout the platform.

project6.title: Bill Splitting Mobile App
project6.shortDescription: Performance-optimized React Native app for easily splitting expenses
project6.detailedDescription:
Built React Native application in a 3-person team with Git version control and CI/CD practices, implementing React-i18next for multilingual support.

Identified and resolved performance bottlenecks using React DevTools, optimizing render cycles with strategic hook implementation.

Implemented Zustand state management with optimized hooks, reducing component render times by ~50%.

Added lazy loading and code splitting for improved load performance, resulting in a highly responsive user experience.

project7.title: My Portfolio
project7.shortDescription: React personal portfolio with responsive design and modern animation effects
project7.detailedDescription:
Designed and built a personal portfolio website using React and Vite to showcase my professional projects and skills.

Implemented responsive layouts with Bootstrap 5 for optimal viewing across all device sizes.

Created custom animations and transitions for a polished user experience.

Integrated TypeScript for improved code quality and developer experience.
